sys_remote_update_set.description: Add Response Templates to Incidents in SOW. Kudos to Alexandre Herrero for his excellent walkthrough. This update set is created and tested on a Vancouver Instance Based on the instructions here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/add-response-templates-customizable-workspace-alexandre-herrero
